modName: Vanilla-like ENB Settings plus Realistic Lighting
summary:
This are my personal settings for ENB v.1.13 and Realistic Lighting Mod Settings.
This settings were aimed to improve Vanilla Skyrim with the use of ENB and RLWC but staying loyal to Skyrim\'s Vanilla Atmosphere.
descriptionHtml:
This are my personal settings for ENB v.1.13 and Realistic Lighting Mod Settings.
This settings were aimed to improve Vanilla Skyrim with the use of ENB and RLWC but staying loyal to Skyrim\'s Vanilla Atmosphere.

ENB INSTALLATION

Since I\'m not allowed to include the .DLL from ENB, you will have to download it from the Author\'s site.

- Download the D3D9.dll file from the official site, version 1.13 (enbdev.com)
http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm

- Extract everything from my file Enb_settings.rar and copy all the files into your Skyrim folder (root folder, not data).
You should have the following:
enbseries.ini
enbpalette.bmp
enbeffectprepass.fx
enbeffect.fx
enbbloom.fx
effect.txt
d3d9.dll

REALISTIC LIGHTING INSTALLATION

- Extract all the files from Realistic_lighting.rar into your Skyrim/Data folder
realistic lighting patcher.esp
realistic lighting patcher.jar
realistic lighting.esp
realisticlighting.ini

I\'d advice to put this files first in your Skyrim load order, right after Skyrim\'s master files.
Realistic Lighting.esp
Realistic Lighting Patcher.esp

INSTALLATION OF OPTIONAL FOG/TERRAIN/WATER FIX FILES
Extract everything from Optional_fog_lod_water_tweaks.rar into your Skyrim/Data folder.
What this files do, is to fix the water looking too white/bright, same with the fog, I made it look thinner so it wouldn\'t feel like a there\'s grey curtain of dust blocking your way.
Also there\'s a fix for the snowflakes and some other water types, like water wheels, waterfalls, etc.



THANKS TO:
Plutoman for Realistic Lighting.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654
Boris for ENB
enbdev.com
Everyone else for the Nexus and Steam Modding Community.


*** By posting this I only intend to share my Skyrim Settings, since a lot of people has been asking me for them, but I take no credit whatsoever in the developing of any of the mods involved (ENB / RLWC)



FAQ:
What mods are you using in the screenshots?
HD Plants and herbs + Lush trees.
HQ Textures Overhaul. (Compilation I created from various HQ mods)
A mix of W.A.T.E.R. and Pure Waters + Get wet + Watery rocks.
UNP Body + UNP Vanilla armors.
Distant Detail.
Apachii Hair.

What are the armor mods used on the screenshots?
Most of the armors are modded versions of other modders armor sets (either I modded the meshes, retext or both). I\'ve never uploaded any of those modifications, so I\'ll provide links to the original mods.

Witch Elf
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19319

Blood Witch
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21572

Black Sacrament
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5945

Nocturnal Robes (there\'s a lot of those, the ones I use are my own retext)

Void Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11871

Karliah
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7681

Schweleite
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19823

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14294

R18pn Leere
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11756

Silverlight
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12329
